name: image-processor
description: AWS Lambda to convert and resize images.
author: Jason Conway-Williams

scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=json --reporter=cobertura --reporter=text mocha 'test/unit/**/*.spec.js' --require babel-polyfill --require babel-register --recursive
scripts.test-report: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha 'test/**/*.spec.js' --require babel-polyfill --require babel-register --recursive
scripts.serve: S3_HOST=0.0.0.0 S3_PORT=8001 ENV=dev sls offline -s dev
scripts.upload-canned: aws s3 sync canned-data/images s3://image-sandbox-dev/banner --endpoint http://localhost:8001
scripts.delete-canned: aws s3 rm s3://image-sandbox-dev/banner/LARGE_elevation.jpg --endpoint http://localhost:8001 && aws s3 rm s3://image-sandbox-dev/banner/map.png --endpoint http://localhost:8001
scripts.debug: export DEBUG=* && export SLS_DEBUG=* && node --inspect-brk ./node_modules/.bin/serverless offline -s dev
